name: Herbal Sampler 3-Pack
description:
Miniature medicine cabinet for your pocket or purse.  

Includes .25 oz. samplers of

Miracle Salve, for first-aid
Amazing Muscle Balm, for pain relief
Dream Creme NightBalm, for sleep aid and stress relief

name: Amazing Muscle Balm
description:
This soothing ointment when used externally, provdes effective relief for:

  • aching joints
  • sprains
  • bruises
  • inflamed tendons
  • spasms
  • swelling
  • stiff muscles
  • arthritic pain
  • sports injuries

Primary contents include: Arnica, Lobelia, Ginger, Essential Oil of Eucalyptus, LOVE and healing light.

name: Miracle Salve
description:
Miracle Salve, an external balm, contains 12 healing herbs that make it a favorite all-purpose first aid remedy for:

  • chapped lips
  • cuts, scratches
  • insect bites, stings
  • diaper rash and rashes
  • burns, sunburn
  • abrasions
  • cuts, scratches
  • blemishes
  • calloused elbows, knees

Primary contents include: Comfrey, Calendula, Chickweed, Echinacea, Goldenseal, Juniper, Sage, Aloe Vera, LOVE and healing light.

name: Dream Creme Night Balm
description:
A stress reliever with eight herbal nervines that strengthen strained, weakened nerves. When applied to temples at night it fosters a healthful night’s rest.

Primary contents include: Rosemary, Chamomile, Lavender, Scullcap, Valerian Root, LOVE and healing light.

name: Critter Cure Compound
description:
With three powerful herbal antibiotics: goldenseal, echinacea, sage, plus comfrey and chapparal, this salve speeds healing for pet "ouchies" and especially troublesome "hot-spots." As the animal licks the wound, it benefits both internally and externally from the therapeutic herbs in this special formula.

Primary contents include: Comfrey, Echinecea, Goldenseal, Chapparal, Honey, LOVE and healing light.

name: Roasty Toasty Toesy Salve
description: Contains a powerful blend of the extracts of fifteen herbs that work with the body to increase blood flow to bring a soothing warmth to cold hands and feet, especially during winter weather. Warms without burning sensitive skin. Therapeutic for those with impaired circulation.

name: Sensitive Skin Soothing Salve
description: Sensitive Skin Soothing Salve, was inspired by a request from a mother with a child suffering from severe excema. The result is this herbally rich ointment that has brought welcome relief to her child and many others suffering from the discomfort of excema and psoriasis. Contains eleven therapeutic herbs for healing, including yellow dock, black walnut hull, comfrey, and violet leaf.

name: Deep Tissue Healing
description: Penetrates bone, flesh, and cartilage, to provide deep tissue healing.

name: Herbal Lotion Bars
description: Lotion bars with Shea and Cocoa Butters, almond, olive and grapeseed oils with ten healing herbs provide a luscious and luxurious way to pamper yourself while nourishing your skin.

name: Clarity-Herbal Inhalation Jar
description: This powerful blend of eighteen herbs and essential oils wakes up your head while eliminating airborne bacteria and germs. Provides cold prevention, allergy and sinus relief. A "must" for teachers, health-care workers, childcare providers, "people–working–with–people."

name: Clear Ears Herbal Oil
description: Contains extracts of seven healing antibiotic herbs with tea tree oil to promote ear health.

name: Herbal Ear Cones
description: Herbal ear candles have been used in Asia for five thousand years. These hollow candles help detoxify ears and sinus cavities. They are a beneficial aid for improving hearing and boosting immunity to cold and sinus congestion.

name: Herbal Eye Pillow
description: Fashioned with a variety of pleasing fabrics and filled with flax seed and lavender potpourri, they massage the tiny muscles in and around the eyes to relax and refresh our outer and inner vision. A "must" for those with computer screen fatigue.

name: Memory Remedy
description:
Brain Food for Optimizing Brain Health. The eleven herbal extracts in this formula are HIGH in natural constituents that are ANTI: -aging, -plaque, -oxidant, -depressant, -inflammatory, -dementia, 
-alzheimeran, as well as cholinesterase and Cox-2 inhibitors.
Applied behind the ears where the skin is very thin, it is absorbed transdermally directly into the brain. Use of Memory Remedy can result in improved mental acuity and memory, enhanced clarity and focus of attention/awareness and increased creative thinking and problem-solving ability. Herbal extracts include: Barberry, Bilberry, Blueberry, Celery, Fennel, Ginger, Gingko, Gotu Kola, Green Tea, Rosemary and Stinging Nettle.

name: MemoriTea
description: A complementary formula for Optimizing Brain Health is a tincture with nine herbal extracts that can be taken orally. It provides a tonic for the whole body with natural constituents that are ANTI: -aging, -plaque, -oxidant, -depressant, -inflammatory, -dementia, -alzheimeran, as well as cholinesterase and Cox-2 inhibitors. Herbal extracts include: Basil, Celery, Gingko Biloba, Gotu Kola, Green Tea, Oregano, Sage, Thyme and Tumeric.

name: Brain Health Combo
description:
Memory Remedy

Brain Food for Optimizing Brain Health. The eleven herbal extracts in this formula are HIGH in natural constituents that are ANTI: -aging, -plaque, -oxidant, -depressant, -inflammatory, -dementia, -alzheimeran, as well as cholinesterase and Cox-2 inhibitors.

Applied behind the ears where the skin is very thin, it is absorbed transdermally directly into the brain. Use of Memory Remedy can result in improved mental acuity and memory, enhanced clarity and focus of attention/awareness and increased creative thinking and problem-solving ability. Herbal extracts include: Barberry, Bilberry, Blueberry, Celery, Fennel, Ginger, Gingko, Gotu Kola, Green Tea, Rosemary and Stinging Nettle.

options.name: .5 oz Chubby lip-balm applicator  & 2 oz. Tea

name: CreativiTea
description:
Four Herbal Teas

With these four herbs:

• Peppermint
• Lavendar
• Green Tea
• Rooibos

you can enjoy a variety of healthful combinations to explore the benefits of drinking healing herbal teas. Muslin teabags included.

name: Detox-Tea
description:
This synergistic blend supports the lower bowel and the liver/gall bladder, the organs of elimination that are often overtaxed by our diets wich often include processed and refined foods. These herbs encourage the elimination of waste and assist the motor activity of the intestines in a natural way. Both the Liver & Gall Bladder play an important part in a healthy digestive system. The liver is vital to detoxifying our body and helps in making and storing hormones.

Herbal Contents include: Cascara Sagrada Bark, Barberry Bark, Cayenne Pepper, Ginger Root, Lobelia, Red Raspberry Leaf, Turkey Rhubarb Root, Fennel Seed, Goldenseal Root, Catnip, Wild Yam Root and Peppermint Leaf.

name: Flower Essences
description:
They foster release of negative subconscious patterns of thinking and feeling, and allow for the blossoming of expansive healing energies that transform the body, soul and spirit.

Made with home-grown and/or wild-crafted perennials found in the Midwest. Set of 15 Mother Essences.
Includes: 
- Chicory
- Clematis
- Comfrey
- Daisy
- Hibiscus
- Hydrangea
- Lavender
- Morning glory
- Queen Anne's Lace
- Red Clover
- Rose of Sharon
- Russian Sage
- Sweet Pea
- Tiger Lily
- Yarrow

name: Gem Elixirs for Chakra Balancing
description:
Gem Elixirs are liquid preparations made from gemstones. The electromagnetic energy of Gem Elixirs are useful for treating chakra imbalances. This set includes:
Jasper: for balancing the Crown Chakra
Amethyst: for balancing the Brow Chakra
Quartz, Silver, Lapis Lazuli: for balancing the Throat Chakra
Rose Quart and Adventurine: for balancing the Heart Chakra
Moss Agate and Rainbow Pyrite: for balancing the Solar Plexus Chakra
Chert/Quartz and Fire Agate: for balancing the Navel Chakra
Carnelian and Hematite: for balancing the Root Chakra

name: Cayenne Tincture
description:
Cayenne is the #1 herb for First Aid. Cayenne helps restore normal body functions, relieves rheumatism, counteracts putrefaction and infection, relieves nervous irritability and spasms, condenses and firms the tissues, excites intestinal peristalsis, relieves spasms, promotes expulsion of gas from the gastrointestinal tract, is hot and penetrating, stimulates local circulation, increases saliva and aids digestion, stops bleeding, is a general all around stimulant to activity and energy.

Recommended use: 1-3 dropperfuls in a glass of water. (1 dropper = aprox. 30 drops.) 2 oz. contains approximately 1200 drops.

The Food and Drug Administration have not evaluated this statement. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, or prevent disease.

name: Elderberry Extract
description: Elderberries have been used for hundreds of years for the treatment of colds, fevers, flu and other respiratory problems. Elderberry has been found to inhibit the replication of both type A and B flu viruses. Researchers found that elderberry inhibited the enzymes that attaches the viruses to human cells. It is common knowledge that antibiotics are not very effective against viruses.

name: Hawthorn Tincture
description:
Hawthorn is a traditional herb for the cardiovascular system. Used as a cardiac tonic for edema, heart attack, to regulate blood pressure, for arteriosclerosis, inflamed heart muscle, for rap/arrhythmic heart beat, for a weak pulse, dropsy and heart murmurs.

Recommended use: 1-3 dropperfuls in a glass of water. (1 dropper = aprox. 30 drops.) 2 oz. contains approximately 1200 drops.

The Food and Drug Administration have not evaluated this statement. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, or prevent disease. If you are taking heart medication, you may want to consult with your healthcare provider before using.

name: Fibromyalgia Tincture
description: Fibromyalgia Relief

description: Passion Flower Tincture
